example[0]: two times two equals four (2 x 2 = 4)
definition[2]: an old and famous British daily newspaper.  The Times is a serious paper, and generally supports quite  right-wing political ideas. At one time, especially before television and radio, it had great influence on British political life, and many important people used to give their opinions by writing letters to  The Times. It is now owned by Rupert Murdoch.
